ud6.1:11.5: visāradā → visāradā yogakkhemā (bj) | visāradappattā yogakkhemakāmā (sya-all) | visāradappattā yogakkhemā (pts-vp-pli1ed, mr) | visāradā pattayogakkhemā (^an8.70#1 [70. Bhūmicālasutta])
ud6.1:11.6: Etarahi kho pana, bhante → santi kho pana bhante etarahi (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed ^sn51.10#1 [10. Cetiyasutta])
